name: Vexxeh
description: The Vexxeh is a Huge fiend with a robust build, characterized by its menacing presence and eerie cackle. It features a grotesque design that inspires fear.
memorable: Its ability to terrify opponents with its claw attacks creates a psychological effect in combat.
goals: Typically seeks to instill fear and exert control over its enemies.
relations: Often encountered with lesser fiends, or serving more powerful demonic entities.
environment: Commonly found in dark, chaotic places like corrupted forests or near infernal gates.
strengths: Possesses high physical strength and speed due to its 'Four-Legged Lope' ability.
weaknesses: Has disadvantage on saving throws against charm effects.
attacks: Can make three attacks, dealing piercing and poison damage through its vicious bite, and slashing damage through its claws.
most_powerful_ability: Can frighten opponents with its claw attacks if both hit the same target, creating an area of psychological terror.
senses: Has truesight with a range of 60 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and invisibility.
skills: Proficient in intimidation, able to effectively coerce foes.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition
Resistant to cold, fire, lightning, and nonmagical weapon damage
Emits an aura of sadistic glee that affects nearby creatures
Exceptional physical strength with an emphasis on melee combat
Possesses a high hit point total, enabling it to withstand significant damage
test_queries: huge fiend with terrifying claw attacks
menacing creature with truesight and poison damage
fast creature that strikes hard in melee
fiend that can move quickly and frighten opponents
